title: Project-Based Learning Design Using Multimedia Databases

context.prior_knowledge: Experience with Basic Educational Design Theories and Social Science Data Analysis
context.additional_context: Strengthening instructional design capabilities using standard educational pathways and hypermedia functions in smartphone-centric, limited technological environments

learning_goals: Learners can design multimedia database structures for user groups with varying educational levels
Learners can reorganize hypermedia content based on standard educational pathways to align with specific learning objectives
Learners can develop educational simulation tools that operate in limited technological environments (e.g., smartphones)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
